portfolio

Check my latest projects or choose style reference that you prefer for your presentation!

services

I offer 8 types of services that fully cover all needs in presentation development:

Pitch Deck Design

Whether you're pitching to investors,
training your team, or presenting at
a conference, I specialize in crafting visually
stunning and engaging pitch decks
that leave a lasting impression!

Check the page!

Animated Presentations

Transform your slides into captivating
visual stories: high-quality transitions,
animated elements, musical
accompaniment - will not leave
the audience on the sidelines.!

Check the page!

Infographic Design

Graphs, tables, timelines, diagrams
and many complex elements will look
much better and be easier to perceive
by your audience thanks to the correct
and high-quality infographic.

Check the page!

Print-Ready Presentations

If you plan to print a presentation, then
I will do a complete pre-press preparation
of the presentation in the required format,
in compliance with all the rules for further
high-quality printing.

Check the page!

Interactive Presentations

Transitions between slides, the presence
of interactive buttons, a navigation menu
and animation make the material lively
and memorable. Ideal solution for pitches
and online presentations.

Check the page!

Template Design

Say “goodbye” to boring slideshows and
“hello” to success with meticulously crafted
presentation templates. I design templates
that empower you to deliver captivating
presentations effortlessly, every time.

Check the page!

Copywrite & Text Edit

An overabundance of information on
a slide or the absence of key points
interferes with the correct perception of
the presentation. I will definitely edit, write
or collect data for your great presentation!

Check the page!

3D & Web Design

3D design enhances presentations
with realistic renders, animations, and
visualizations. Web design services include
full-cycle creation of custom websites
tailored to brand identity & business needs.

Check the page!

URGENT PROJECT?
CONTACT NOW!

Fill out the form and I’ll answer in a few minutes!

only 6 steps of working process

Consultation

We target the main goals of the project, clarify the brief, figure out exact budget and deadlines.

Step #1

Test Slides

I create 2-3 test slides for approval by style, colors and overall composition.

Step #2

Feedback

We include edits to the test design based on your comments until the style is fully approved.

Step #3

Design

I continue to work on the remaining slides according to the previously approved style.

Step #4

Feedback #2

We include edits design based on your comments until the pitch deck is fully approved.

Step #5

Delivery

I ship all source files and additional graphics of the project.

Step #6
book a free consultation

Advantages

Free 3 waves of edits

I provide 3 waves of free edits. This ensures that the outcome aligns perfectly with your expectations.

Free files shipping

All source files, including images, fonts and additional graphics will be send for the future independent edits and updates.

Free audit

I analyze, show and give exact recommendations about improving your current pitch deck.

Free consultation

I will answer all your questions according presentation design so the further cooperation will be as comfortable as possible.

Saving your team valuable time

Your consultants focus on content and delivery — I handle the visual execution, ensuring polish without disrupting workflow.

Design aligned with business outcomes

Every slide is crafted with purpose: to persuade clients, win pitches, present strategies, or defend high-stakes initiatives.

Enhancing expertise through visuals

I transform complex data and strategic insights into clear, compelling slides — amplifying your message and reinforcing your authority.

Flexible formats for every business need

From client decks and internal workshops to executive reports and keynote presentations — I tailor visuals to the context, audience, and goal.

FAQs:
